pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, January 23, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus Winter Retreat, and will deliver brief remarks.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:45 a.m.
